sentences.en: Below his preternatural affability there is some acid and steel ( George F. Will )
sentences.cn: 在他异常和蔼可亲的表情之下,有着尖刻和钢铁般的坚毅 ( 乔治F. 威尔 )

sentences.en: Below his preternatural affability there is some acid and steel.
sentences.cn: 在他异常和蔼可亲的表情之下,有着尖刻和钢铁般的坚毅.

sentences.en: Beyond his preternatural affability there is some acid and some steel - George Will.
sentences.cn: 在他异常和蔼可亲的表情之下,有着尖刻和钢铁般的坚毅 - 乔治·威尔.

sentences.en: Beyond his preternatural affability there is some acid and some steel.
sentences.cn: 在他异常和蔼可亲的表情之下,有着尖刻的性格和钢铁般坚毅的意志.

sentences.en: Hawaii imbued Obama with the laid back , almost preternatural calm that has underpinned his political career.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷陶冶了奥巴马的性情,使他在政治生涯中得以冷静超脱.

sentences.en: He felt possessed of a preternatural strength and fearlessness.
sentences.cn: 他感到自己拥有异乎寻常的力量和勇气。

sentences.en: In former times people believed that thunder and lightning were signs of preternatural forces.
sentences.cn: 古时候人们相信雷电是异常力量的象徵.

sentences.en: In Pearl's young beauty, as in the wrinkled witch, it has a preternatural effect.
sentences.cn: 在年幼、美丽的珠儿身上, 和那满脸皱纹的老妖婆一样, 准有一种超自然的力量.

sentences.en: So keen and perceptive as to seem preternatural.
sentences.cn: 离奇的敏锐或锐利得近乎不可思议的.

sentences.en: The suddenness of storms in that climate is something almost preternatural.
sentences.cn: 在那地带,突起的风暴几乎是件不可思议的事.

sentences.en: Their parents had an almost preternatural ability to understand what was going on in their children's minds.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母有着一种近乎神奇的能力，能够洞悉他们的孩子脑子里在想些什么。

words.tran_cn: 异常地；超自然地；不可思议地
超自然的；异常的，不可思议的

trans.tran_cn: 异常的，奇特的，超自然的，不可思议的
trans.tran_en: beyond what is usual or normal
